queriesList.name: CPU - System Processes executing in kernel mode
CPU - User Normal processes executing in user mode
CPU - Nice Niced processes executing in user mode
CPU - Iowait Waiting for I O to complete
CPU - Steal Time spent in other operating systems when running in a virtualized environment
Memory Stack - Apps Memory used by user space applications
CPU - Idle Waiting for something to happen
Memory Stack - SwapCache   Memory that keeps track of pages that have been fetched from swap but not yet been modified
Memory Stack - PageTables   Memory used to map between virtual and physical memory addresses
Memory Stack - Cache Parked file data file content cache
Memory Stack - Slab   Memory used by the kernel to cache data structures for its own use  caches like inode  dentry  etc
Memory Stack - Unused   Free memory unassigned
Memory Stack - Buffers Block device e g harddisk cache
Memory Stack - Hardware Corrupted Amount of RAM that the kernel identified as corrupted not working
Memory Stack - Swap Swap space used
I/O Usage Read / Write - Successfully read bytes
I/O Usage Read / Write - Successfully written bytes
Memory Pages In / Out - Pagesin   Page in operations
Memory Pages In / Out - Pagesout Page out operations
Memory Pages Swap In / Out - Pswpin Pages swapped in
Memory Pages Swap In / Out - Pswpout Pages swapped out
Memory Page Faults - Pgfault Page major and minor fault operations
Memory Page Faults - Pgmajfault Major page fault operations
Memory Page Faults - Pgminfault Minor page fault operations
Processes Status - Processes blocked waiting for I O to complete
Processes Status - Processes in runnable state
Processes Memory - Processes virtual memory size in bytes
Processes Memory - Maximum amount of virtual memory available in bytes
Processes Memory - Processes virtual memory size in bytes
Processes Memory - Maximum amount of virtual memory available in bytes
Processes Memory - Maximum amount of virtual memory available in bytes
PIDs Number and Limit - PIDs limit
Process schedule stats Running / Waiting - CPU seconds spent running a process
Process schedule stats Running / Waiting - CPU seconds spent by processing waiting for this CPU
Threads Number and Limit - Allocated threads
Threads Number and Limit - Threads limit
Disk Average Wait Time - Read wait time avg
Disk Average Wait Time - Write wait time avg
Disk IOps Discards completed / merged - Discards completed
Disk IOps Discards completed / merged - Discards merged
